New Records: India recorded its highest total of the tournament so far with 181/8
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's 28-ball 53 laid the winning template
Rahmanullah Gurbaz was deceived by a slower ball from Bumrah
Gulbadin Naib (17, 21b), Azmatullah Omarzai (26, 20b) and Najibullah Zadran (19, 17b) delayed the inevitable

A high standard for the rest of the tournament, all of which will be held in the Caribbean, has been set
Miscellaneous Highlights: The move from USA to Barbados was seamless, as India crushed Afghanistan by 47 runs in its first Super 8 game here on Thursday
On a dry pitch, it proved a mountain to climb for Afghanistan
Others: Jasprit Bumrah (3/7) and the three spinners put the stranglehold on the Afghans
